title: Gangs of New York [2002 PAL DVD][En Subs[Nordic+En.Hr.Sl]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0217505/7,4" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0217505/7,4</a>



The seeds for revenge take place in 1846, when a battle is fought against the Irish and the "native" Americans over the five points area of New York City. It is here where "Bill the Butcher" (Day-Lewis) slays Priest Vallon, whose son, Amsterdam Vallon (Dicaprio) is then taken to an orphanage. The plot unfolds when in 1863, Amsterdam returns to the five points to seek revenge against his fathers killer.



Director Martin Scorsese
Certificate 18 years and over
Year 2002
Screen Widescreen 2.35:1 Anamorphic
Languages English - Dolby Digital 5.1 + DTS
Subtitles Nordic + English Slovenian Croatian 
Duration 2 hours and 40 minutes (approx)
Region Region 2

Actors

Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel Day-Lewis, Cameron Diaz, Liam Neeson, Jim Broadbent, John C. Reilly, Henry Thomas, Brendan Gleeson, David Hemmings, Alec McCowen, Tim Pigott-Smith & John Sessions
